    #include <iostream>
    #include<stdio.h>
    using namespace std;

    long long int modmul(long long int a,long long int b,long long int m)
    {
    long long int q=(long long int)(((long double)a*(long double)b)/(long double)m);
    long long int r=a*b-q*m;
    r%=m;
    if(r<0)r+=m;
    return r;
    }

    int main() {
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    unsigned long long int n,b,m;
    scanf("%llu%llu",&n,&b);
    long long int ans=1;
    m=2*b;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    ans=modmul(ans,i,2*b);
    if(ans>=b)
    printf("Odd\n");
    else
    printf("Even\n");
    }
    return 0;
    }
